channel.title: Now im being serious
channel.description: im planning on getting a partyhat, i honestly dont care which color, but im going to save up for it, now what is the fastest way to make money? how long would it take estimated i only have 30m atm lol

item.title: Now im being serious
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Get 100 mill, then you can do some item flipping, junk trading, or join Smokin Mils. I recommend their clan because I did some merching with them back when I still played, they rarely make bad item calls. They are nothing like those bullshit scam clans that advertise all day in world 1.

Good luck with your goals bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Now im being serious
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:371383”]yep, merchanted, though im not the best mercher… so…
yeah…
oh, would i be able to make cash by like following merch clans, then selling the item before their supposed dump price? would i be able to merch like that?[/quote]

Yes, but it is very risky. Most of the time the clan will dump early itself, and you can easily be stuck with tons of items that are now crashing. If you learn how to be a solo merchant well, it will probably make a bigger outcome than risking yourself with a merchanting clan. Merchanting clans have as big of a potential of making you farther away from your partyhat than making you closer to it.

Read full topic
